name: Dreamweaver Site Settings File
summary: Learn about .STE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: STE files are saved in XML so that site settings can easily be exported and imported between multiple computers.

description: Site settings file created by Dreamweaver, a program used to create Web sites; contains site publishing information, such as the remote server, login name, encrypted password, remote folder, and local folder; used for backing up and reusing site settings.
